nameInfo.label: Reserved capacity
nameInfo.summary: Total CPU capacity reserved by virtual machines

nameInfo.label: System
nameInfo.summary: Amount of time spent on system processes on each virtual CPU in the virtual machine

nameInfo.label: Wait
nameInfo.summary: Total CPU time spent in wait state

nameInfo.label: Ready
nameInfo.summary: Time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU during last measurement interval

nameInfo.label: Idle
nameInfo.summary: Total time that the CPU spent in an idle state

nameInfo.label: Used
nameInfo.summary: Total CPU usage

nameInfo.label: CPU Capacity Provisioned
nameInfo.summary: Capacity in MHz of the physical CPU cores

nameInfo.label: CPU Capacity Entitlement
nameInfo.summary: CPU resources devoted by the ESXi scheduler to the virtual machines and resource pools

nameInfo.label: CPU Capacity Usage
nameInfo.summary: CPU usage as a percent during the interval.

nameInfo.label: CPU Capacity Demand
nameInfo.summary: The amount of CPU resources a VM would use if there were no CPU contention or CPU limit

nameInfo.label: CPU Capacity Contention
nameInfo.summary: Percent of time the VM is unable to run because it is contending for access to the physical CPU(s)

nameInfo.label: CPU Core Count Provisioned
nameInfo.summary: The number of virtual processors provisioned to the entity.

nameInfo.label: CPU Core Count Usage
nameInfo.summary: The number of virtual processors running on the host.

nameInfo.label: CPU Core Count Contention
nameInfo.summary: Time the VM vCPU is ready to run, but is unable to run due to co-scheduling constraints

nameInfo.summary: Amount of physical memory consumed by VMs on this host

nameInfo.summary: Amount of physical memory consumed by userworlds on this host

nameInfo.label: Usage
nameInfo.summary: Aggregated disk I/O rate. For hosts, this metric includes the rates for all virtual machines running on the host during the collection interval.

nameInfo.label: Usage
nameInfo.summary: Aggregated disk I/O rate. For hosts, this metric includes the rates for all virtual machines running on the host during the collection interval.

nameInfo.label: Usage

nameInfo.label: Read requests
nameInfo.summary: Number of disk reads during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Write requests
nameInfo.summary: Number of disk writes during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Read rate
nameInfo.summary: Average number of kilobytes read from the disk each second during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Write rate
nameInfo.summary: Average number of kilobytes written to disk each second during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Command latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time taken during the collection interval to process a SCSI command issued by the guest OS to the virtual machine

nameInfo.label: Highest latency
nameInfo.summary: Highest latency value across all disks used by the host

nameInfo.label: Commands aborted
nameInfo.summary: Number of SCSI commands aborted during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Bus resets
nameInfo.summary: Number of SCSI-bus reset commands issued during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Average read requests per second
nameInfo.summary: Average number of disk reads per second during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Average write requests per second
nameInfo.summary: Average number of disk writes per second during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Disk Throughput Usage
nameInfo.summary: Aggregated disk I/O rate, including the rates for all virtual machines running on the host during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Disk Throughput Contention
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time for an I/O operation to complete successfully

nameInfo.label: Disk SCSI Reservation Conflicts
nameInfo.summary: Number of SCSI reservation conflicts for the LUN during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Disk SCSI Reservation Conflicts %
nameInfo.summary: Number of SCSI reservation conflicts for the LUN as a percent of total commands during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Net Throughput Provisioned
nameInfo.summary: The maximum network bandwidth for the host

nameInfo.summary: The current available network bandwidth for the host

nameInfo.label: pNic Packets Received and Transmitted per Second
nameInfo.summary: Average rate of packets received and transmitted per second

nameInfo.label: Uptime
nameInfo.summary: Total time elapsed, in seconds, since last system startup

nameInfo.label: Heartbeat
nameInfo.summary: Number of heartbeats issued per virtual machine during the interval

nameInfo.summary: Current power usage

nameInfo.label: Cap
nameInfo.summary: Maximum allowed power usage

nameInfo.label: Energy usage
nameInfo.summary: Total energy used since last stats reset

nameInfo.label: Host Power Capacity Provisioned
nameInfo.summary: Current power usage as a percentage of maximum allowed power.

nameInfo.label: Average commands issued per second
nameInfo.summary: Average number of commands issued per second by the storage adapter during the collection interval

nameInfo.summary: Average number of read commands issued per second by the storage adapter during the collection interval

nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time for an I/O operation to complete successfully

nameInfo.label: Storage Adapter Outstanding I/Os

nameInfo.label: Worst case allocation
nameInfo.summary: Amount of CPU resources allocated to the virtual machine or resource pool, based on the total cluster capacity and the resource configuration of the resource hierarchy

nameInfo.label: Entitlement
nameInfo.summary: Memory allocation as calculated by the VMkernel scheduler based on current estimated demand and reservation, limit, and shares policies set for all virtual machines and resource pools in the host or cluster

nameInfo.label: CPU fairness
nameInfo.summary: Fairness of distributed CPU resource allocation

nameInfo.label: Memory fairness
nameInfo.summary: Aggregate available memory resources of all the hosts within a cluster

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network failed to match mapping entry for a unicast MAC throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that cannot find matched mapping entry for this network

nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that failed to acquire new mapping entry during translation phase for this network

nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that found matched ARP entry for this network

nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets whose matched arp entry is marked as unknown for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Failed to Allocate ARP Entry During Translation Phase Throughput

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network found the same ARP requests have been sent into queue throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets whose ARP requests have already been sent into queue for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Found ARP Queries Have Been Expired Throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of arp queries that have been expired for this network

nameInfo.label: VM host and datastore change count (non-powered-on VMs)
nameInfo.summary: Number of host and datastore change operations for powered-off and suspended virtual machines

nameInfo.label: vMotion count
nameInfo.summary: Number of migrations with vMotion (host change operations for powered-on VMs)

nameInfo.label: VM host and datastore change count (powered-on VMs)

nameInfo.label: Effective CPU resources
nameInfo.summary: Total available CPU resources of all hosts within a cluster

nameInfo.label: Effective memory resources
nameInfo.summary: Total amount of machine memory of all hosts in the cluster that is available for use for virtual machine memory and overhead memory

nameInfo.label: Total
nameInfo.summary: Total amount of CPU resources of all hosts in the cluster

nameInfo.label: Total
nameInfo.summary: Total amount of host physical memory of all hosts in the cluster that is available for virtual machine memory (physical memory for use by the guest OS) and virtual machine overhead memory

nameInfo.label: Current failover level
nameInfo.summary: vSphere HA number of failures that can be tolerated

nameInfo.label: Space actually used

nameInfo.label: Space potentially used

nameInfo.summary: Configured size of the datastore

nameInfo.label: Space not shared
nameInfo.summary: Amount of space associated exclusively with a virtual machine

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network packets throughput transmitted
nameInfo.summary: The rate of transmitted packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network non-unicast packets throughput transmitted
nameInfo.summary: The rate of transmitted non-unicast packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network cross-router packets throughput transmitted
nameInfo.summary: The rate of transmitted cross-router packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network dropped transmitted packets throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of dropped transmitted packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network packets throughput received
nameInfo.summary: The rate of received packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network dropped received packets due to destination IP error throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of dropped received packets with destination IP error for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network dropped received packets throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of dropped received packets for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network failed to match mapping entry for a unicast MAC throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that cannot find matched mapping entry for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network failed to allocate a new mapping entry during translation phase
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that failed to acquire new mapping entry during translation phase for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network failed to allocate a new mapping entry during learning phase
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that failed to acquire new mapping entry during learning phase for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Found Matched ARP Entry Throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that found matched ARP entry for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Found Matched ARP Entry Marked as Unknown Throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets whose matched arp entry is marked as unknown for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Failed to Allocate ARP Entry During Translation Phase Throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets that failed to acquire new ARP entry during translation phase for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN network found the same ARP requests have been sent into queue throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of transmitted packets whose ARP requests have already been sent into queue for this network

nameInfo.label: VXLAN Network Found ARP Queries Have Been Expired Throughput
nameInfo.summary: Count of arp queries that have been expired for this network

nameInfo.label: Swap wait
nameInfo.summary: CPU time spent waiting for swap-in

nameInfo.label: Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization as a percentage during the interval (CPU usage and CPU utilization might be different due to power management technologies or hyper-threading)

nameInfo.label: Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization as a percentage during the interval (CPU usage and CPU utilization might be different due to power management technologies or hyper-threading)

nameInfo.label: Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization as a percentage during the interval (CPU usage and CPU utilization might be different due to power management technologies or hyper-threading)

nameInfo.label: Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization as a percentage during the interval (CPU usage and CPU utilization might be different due to power management technologies or hyper-threading)

nameInfo.label: Core Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization of the corresponding core (if hyper-threading is enabled) as a percentage during the interval (A core is utilized if either or both of its logical CPUs are utilized)

nameInfo.label: Core Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization of the corresponding core (if hyper-threading is enabled) as a percentage during the interval (A core is utilized if either or both of its logical CPUs are utilized)

nameInfo.label: Core Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization of the corresponding core (if hyper-threading is enabled) as a percentage during the interval (A core is utilized if either or both of its logical CPUs are utilized)

nameInfo.label: Core Utilization
nameInfo.summary: CPU utilization of the corresponding core (if hyper-threading is enabled) as a percentage during the interval (A core is utilized if either or both of its logical CPUs are utilized)

nameInfo.label: Total capacity
nameInfo.summary: Total CPU capacity reserved by and available for virtual machines

nameInfo.label: Latency
nameInfo.summary: Percent of time the virtual machine is unable to run because it is contending for access to the physical CPU(s)

nameInfo.label: Entitlement
nameInfo.summary: CPU resources devoted by the ESX scheduler

nameInfo.label: Demand
nameInfo.summary: The amount of CPU resources a virtual machine would use if there were no CPU contention or CPU limit

nameInfo.label: Co-stop
nameInfo.summary: Time the virtual machine is ready to run, but is unable to run due to co-scheduling constraints

nameInfo.label: Max limited
nameInfo.summary: Time the virtual machine is ready to run, but is not run due to maxing out its CPU limit setting

nameInfo.label: Overlap
nameInfo.summary: Time the virtual machine was interrupted to perform system services on behalf of itself or other virtual machines

nameInfo.label: Run
nameInfo.summary: Time the virtual machine is scheduled to run

nameInfo.label: Demand-to-entitlement ratio
nameInfo.summary: CPU resource entitlement to CPU demand ratio (in percents)

nameInfo.label: Readiness
nameInfo.summary: Percentage of time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU

nameInfo.label: Swap in
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped in from the swap space since the virtual machine has been powered on. This value is less than or equal to the 'Swap out' counter

nameInfo.label: Swap in
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped in from the swap space since the virtual machine has been powered on. This value is less than or equal to the 'Swap out' counter

nameInfo.label: Swap in
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped in from the swap space since the virtual machine has been powered on. This value is less than or equal to the 'Swap out' counter

nameInfo.label: Swap in
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped in from the swap space since the virtual machine has been powered on. This value is less than or equal to the 'Swap out' counter

nameInfo.label: Swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped out from the virtual machine to its swap space since it has been powered on.

nameInfo.label: Swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped out from the virtual machine to its swap space since it has been powered on.

nameInfo.label: Swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped out from the virtual machine to its swap space since it has been powered on.

nameInfo.label: Swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is swapped out from the virtual machine to its swap space since it has been powered on.

nameInfo.label: VMkernel consumed
nameInfo.summary: Amount of host physical memory consumed by VMkernel

nameInfo.label: VMkernel consumed
nameInfo.summary: Amount of host physical memory consumed by VMkernel

nameInfo.label: VMkernel consumed
nameInfo.summary: Amount of host physical memory consumed by VMkernel

nameInfo.label: VMkernel consumed
nameInfo.summary: Amount of host physical memory consumed by VMkernel

nameInfo.label: Active write
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory that is being actively written by guest. Activeness is estimated by ESXi

nameInfo.label: Overhead reserved
nameInfo.summary: Host physical memory reserved by ESXi, for its data structures, for running the virtual machine

nameInfo.label: Total reservation
nameInfo.summary: Total reservation, available and consumed, for powered-on virtual machines

nameInfo.label: Compressed
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory pages compressed by ESXi

nameInfo.label: Compression saved
nameInfo.summary: Host physical memory, reclaimed from a virtual machine, by memory compression. This value is less than the value of 'Compressed' memory

nameInfo.label: Page-fault latency
nameInfo.summary: Percentage of time the virtual machine spent waiting to swap in or decompress guest physical memory

nameInfo.label: Entitlement
nameInfo.summary: Amount of host physical memory the virtual machine deserves, as determined by ESXi

nameInfo.label: Reclamation threshold
nameInfo.summary: Threshold of free host physical memory below which ESXi will begin actively reclaiming memory from virtual machines by swapping, compression and ballooning

nameInfo.label: Host cache consumed
nameInfo.summary: Storage space consumed on the host swap cache for storing swapped guest physical memory pages

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap in rate
nameInfo.summary: Rate at which guest physical memory is swapped in from the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap out rate
nameInfo.summary: Rate at which guest physical memory is swapped out to the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: Overhead active
nameInfo.summary: Estimate of the host physical memory, from Overhead consumed, that is actively read or written to by ESXi

nameInfo.label: Host cache consumed
nameInfo.summary: Storage space consumed on the host swap cache for storing swapped guest physical memory pages

nameInfo.label: Host cache consumed
nameInfo.summary: Storage space consumed on the host swap cache for storing swapped guest physical memory pages

nameInfo.summary: Storage space consumed on the host swap cache for storing swapped guest physical memory pages

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap in
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped in from host cache

nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped in from host cache

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: Host cache swap out
nameInfo.summary: Amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the host swap cache

nameInfo.label: VMFS PB Cache Size
nameInfo.summary: Space used for holding VMFS Pointer Blocks in memory

nameInfo.label: Maximum VMFS PB Cache Size
nameInfo.summary: Maximum size the VMFS Pointer Block Cache can grow to

nameInfo.label: VMFS Working Set
nameInfo.summary: Amount of file blocks whose addresses are cached in the VMFS PB Cache

nameInfo.label: Maximum VMFS Working Set
nameInfo.summary: Maximum amount of file blocks whose addresses are cached in the VMFS PB Cache

nameInfo.label: VMFS PB Cache Overhead
nameInfo.summary: Amount of VMFS heap used by the VMFS PB Cache

nameInfo.label: VMFS PB Cache Capacity Miss Ratio
nameInfo.summary: Trailing average of the ratio of capacity misses to compulsory misses for the VMFS PB Cache

nameInfo.label: Commands issued
nameInfo.summary: Number of SCSI commands issued during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Physical device read latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, to read from the physical device

nameInfo.label: Kernel read latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, spent by VMkernel to process each SCSI read command

nameInfo.label: Read latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time taken during the collection interval to process a SCSI read command issued from the guest OS to the virtual machine

nameInfo.label: Queue read latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time spent in the VMkernel queue, per SCSI read command, during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Physical device write latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, to write to the physical device

nameInfo.label: Kernel write latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, spent by VMkernel to process each SCSI write command

nameInfo.label: Write latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time taken during the collection interval to process a SCSI write command issued by the guest OS to the virtual machine

nameInfo.label: Queue write latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time spent in the VMkernel queue, per SCSI write command, during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Physical device command latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, to complete a SCSI command from the physical device

nameInfo.label: Kernel command latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time, in milliseconds, spent by VMkernel to process each SCSI command

nameInfo.label: Queue command latency
nameInfo.summary: Average amount of time spent in the VMkernel queue, per SCSI command, during the collection interval

nameInfo.label: Maximum queue depth

nameInfo.label: Average commands issued per second
nameInfo.summary: Average number of SCSI commands issued per second during the collection interval

nameInfo.summary: Number of transmits dropped
